p.d: Rendez-vous with Laura Delfosse at her permaculture farm in Redu. Encounter with Jean-Pierre Estievenart, in the Mons region, with Robin Guns who runs the Cocoricoop in Ciney, with Julien des Bois in the Pyrenees, and with Pablo Servigne, "collapsology" theorist.
